divs: sighting detailswitness called dispatch, report was written by dispatch as he was talking to witness. steve cox, mufon dispatch note: witness now lives in florida, event is in new jersey. witness worked air traffic control for 35 years in the area of nyc and newark. witness came from a movie, looked at traffic pattern, saw 2 air planes coming in for approach, the saw this huge triangle just sitting in the sky. witness was about 2 miles from object. object was so large you could park 5 to 7 747 on top if it, size estimated to be 1\4 to 1\2 mile long. object was 5 miles due west of nyc pointing towards nyc. witness checked with surrounding towers and no one picked them up on radar, and no pilot reported seeing anything. witness plotted area and it was the only safe area to sit in with all the traffic patterns.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Newark
There were no other sightings in Newark on or around August 1st 1997
